item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.terra_sho: Also fires a Mana Burst dealing %1$d damage
item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.balloon_b: Ties a balloon to the target
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.zani: A Zanite weapon is not finished until wear and tear reveals its true strength. One day this pistol will hold tremendous firepower.
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.grav: A bulky design that focuses the powers of Gravitite into a short range shockwave.
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.zani: A bullet will not last long enough to benefit from Zanite's unique strength, but it remains an effective projectile.
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.skyj: The green glint of Skyjade is a reminder of its strength, but also its fragility. Something to cherish before it fades in the wind.
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.veri: A sleek design, but the weight of Veridium makes it awkward to wield. Infusing it with Ambrosium should fix this.
Infusing the Veridium makes this revolver feel weightless. Ideal for spinning.
lore.item.gunswithoutrosesadditions.arke: Working Arkenium feels oddly familiar. With your eyes closed it would be hard to tell it apart from an Iron Gun.
It's impressive how similar Arkenium feels to Iron. These bullets could easily pass for Iron Bullets.
